name: Φ–Π Layer — Projection & Evaluation
purpose: Defines the projection (Φ) and evaluation (Π) operators that convert geometric deviation (δ) into semantic form and causal truth. Completes the Tri-Unity structure δ–Φ–Π.
notes: Φ maps states to semantic form; Π maps semantic forms to causal truth. Together they close the minimal semantic cycle.
